transArray.content: Not far from the subway, the transportation is quite convenient. It's a chain hotel. The house is a bit small. The sound insulation is good. It's next to the road and I don't think it's too noisy.

Hello dear guest! I'm slightly sorry that I couldn't get your full five-star recognition. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we would like to be your warmest site. The hotel room area is affected by the structure of the rental property and the newly opened store does exist. There is a certain gap. Although the room is small, the facilities in the room are complete. The hotel rooms and supporting facilities in the public area can meet your daily living needs. We will continue to work hard and use our careful work to exchange for your peace of mind and comfort during your stay. The hotel All staff look forward to your every visit and wish you a happy life. Manager: Zhang Minghui
